dct_title_s: A new map of France : shewing the roads & post stages thro-out that Kingdom, as also the errors of Sanson's map compard wth ye survey made by order of ye late French King
dct_description_sm: Inset: [Part of Catalonia]. "Most humbly inscrib'd to the Right Honble. the Earl of Stairs, &c."
